page.title: Liam Anderson - Profile, Portfolio and Projects
page.description: Liam Anderson Full-Stack Web developer | Lancashire, Lancaster
page.intro:
Hi, I’m Liam a Full-Stack web developer with over four years experience working as a web developer in a professional capacity using a plethora of languages including PHP, Python, JS, SCSS and working with many CMSs like WordPress, Magento, Drupal and Django to create web sites and applications, I have also been involved in data science projects creating automation and data gathering tools.

I offer freelance and project consultation so please feel free to look at some of my in development projects on display here, visit my GitHub profile or email me at me@liamanderson.co.uk. I also Provide Tutoring for programming and Computer Science, if yourself, child or someone else is interested get in touch via email to discuss package and curriculum
